Title: The Amityville Horror
Writer: Sandor Stern (screenplay), Jay Anson (based on the book by)
Actors: James Brolin, Margot Kidder, Rod Steiger, Don Stroud
Plot: Newlyweds and their three kids move into a large house where a mass murder was committed. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations which have strong effects on everyone living or visiting the house.
